synopsis.text:
Action and intrigue unfold in the technologically advanced Academy City, where espers with superhuman abilities are ranked from Level 0 to Level 5, with the latter being the most powerful. Among these elite Level 5s, Accelerator stands as the strongest, even after a significant loss of power. After a fateful encounter with the lively Last Order, Accelerator becomes her protector, vowing to shield her from harm. As he recovers in the hospital, his peaceful life is disrupted by the arrival of the enigmatic Estelle Rosenthal, who carries a photo of Last Order.

Accelerator soon learns of the sinister Disciplinary Action organization, which seeks to exploit Last Order for a dangerous mission. With the group hot on Last Order's trail, the world's most powerful esper must rise to the challenge once more, joined by a newfound ally. Together, they must protect Last Order and defend Academy City from the looming threat. As the darkness encroaches, Accelerator prepares to face his most formidable challenge yet in this thrilling tale of power, friendship, and loyalty.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
